column5: Last year I noticed a place next to the Super 8 called Boston something, it appears that its a sportsbar/restaraunt. I just got a glimpse of it as we drove by, is this the Boston Pizza chain? We got reservations at the Super 8 this year after staying at the Red Dog the past couple of years. Ten years ago it was fun to stay at the red dog(cant recall the name now) and have a bite to eat and have a few drinks before we continue on the next day to our resort but last year was the place hit rock bottom. Used to enjoy their hot wings.What can you tell me about this Boston place? Hows the food? Is it a sports bar as well?
Had pizza there last July and thought it was pretty good. Better than expected actually.

Boston Pizza is a national chain. The food is pretty good. I have not eaten at the one in Fort Frances, but it should be pretty much the same as the ones I have eaten at. One side is usually a sports bar like, and another side a restaurant. It is a nice place to unwind and have a few drinks.Fisherman 1792
Stayed at the super 8 last spring and in the fall , ate at boston pizza both trips. Pizza is pretty good, we stayed on friday nights both trips.Go early or you'll wait for a place to sit.

Yep, the fort frances boston pizza is good eats, and drinks.The red dog is now called the adventure inn, and is still a pretty good time. It's about a half block away from boston pizza if you wanna check out both places.
Staying at the Super 8 in June, I will have to try this Boston Pizza out, not sure there chain is in Minnesota or by the twin cities, huh.
Have stayed at the Super 8 for the last 10 yrs and now with the Boston Pizza in the parking lot, it just makes the stay all the better.
Went to Boston Pizza for many years in Kenora,the food was always good and we use to watch sporting events there while having a couple of cool ones
I've also patronized the one in Kenora and both the pizza and Italian sandwiches were pretty good.
